name: Subvert Ownership
action: Instant and contested; successes are compared to target spell's Potency
effect: The mage may specify a new rightful owner, set of authorized users or designated heir (per the Last Testament spell) for an Enchanted Item. A single casting of Subvert Ownership targets any and all spells woven into an item that depend on such designations.

rotes.roteDescription: The Mysterium's shadier members are loath to allow mere technicalities of ownership stand in the way of a prestigious acquisition.
